GovReady openSCAP, SSG

Welcome

Welcome to your GovReady virtual machine running for openSCAP and SSG.

Learn more

pre-release

What is this?

This is a CentOS virtual machine from GovReady. Think of it like a virtual car that you can keep, delete, save, copy, or customize.

Where is it?

This virtual machine is running on your local computer, instantiated by Vagrant.

Who can see this?

This server can be seen by you on your host computer, and by anyone on your network and knows your host computer's IP address.

How secure is this?

This is a demo server for exploring openSCAP and SCAP Security Guide on CentOS. This server has not secured.

What is GovReady?

GovReady is a non-profit that creates and shares blueprints for hardened, accreditation-ready configurations of innovative technology.
